page.title: 10THE PORT OF WISBECH.
page.content: Some of port activity has remained unchanged for years.But the transition from horse and cart to 40 tonne articulated lorries meant that in name of safety and for freer working conditions on the quayside the local council,(Fenland District),had to seperate non-port and pedestrian trafficfrom activity on the Corporation Quay.Between 1982 and 1984 a port relief road was constructed.As part of the same development a 25 acre site was cleared to attract industry especially those involved in importing and exporting. PORT STATISTICS-Number of ships handled 300.Imports 130,000 tonnes.Exports 70,000 tonnes.Major cargoes potatoes,timber,cereals.
